ee2f023f-fb03-4d96-9d3c-cf73a7e69364.description: Performance Consultancy Masterclass: esta credencial demuestra que el receptor aplica un enfoque de consultoría que ayuda a sus clientes internos y externos a afrontar problemas y encontrar soluciones adecuadas. El Consultor de Desempeño ha demostrado que tiene las aptitudes necesarias para ser un consultor efectivo y un partner de la empresa.
ee2f023f-fb03-4d96-9d3c-cf73a7e69364.name: Certified Performance Consultant ES

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: Entender la verdadera necesidad que hay detrás de cada petición de solución. El Consultor de Desempeño tiene la habilidad de descubrir lo que la empresa necesita realmente, aprender cómo asesorar problemas y gaps de desempeño y alinear las soluciones con los objetivos de negocio.

Desarrollar soluciones efectivas que proveen resultados de negocio. Para ello utiliza nuevas herramientas que ayudan al diseño de soluciones integradas y cierran gaps de desempeño a la vez que maximizan iniciativas organizacionales.

Mejorar la comunicación y construir confianza. El Consultor de Desempeño promueve el apoyo organizacional a la mejora del desempeño y proporciona ejemplos y orientación de cómo implementar iniciativas de forma organizada e influyente.

Demostrar y medir ROI. El Consultor de Desempeño ha aprendido técnicas simples que ayudarán a realizar un seguimiento de los resultados y demostrar Retorno de la Inversión y mejores métricas de negocio.

Ejercer como asesor de negocio de confianza. El Consultor de Desempeño ha pasado de recibir pedidos de aprendizaje a ser un consultor de negocio respetado con experiencia en construir soluciones de impacto.

cc1c2667-6c2e-4c5e-a34c-da2840b5a557.description: The Learning Awards recognise outstanding examples of high standards, best practice, innovation and excellence in Learning and Development.The Apprenticeship Programme of the Year Award is presented to an enterprise that has implemented any kind of Apprenticeship Programme that can show demonstrable capability development for the organisation.

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

The Learning Culture of the Year Award is presented to an organisation that has demonstrated an environment that enables learning to flourish and happen naturally in the flow of work, creating a ‘lifelong’ learning mindset.
ef0f0060-3014-4e8c-80b5-b4eb5bcccefd.name: Learning Culture of the Year 2023 - Bronze Winner

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: The organisation has demonstrated evidence that the organisation fosters lifelong learning and ongoing learning collaboration. Everyone in the organisation should have the opportunity to make mistakes and learn from them. Learning in the organisation should be both relevant and accessible for all employees. Leaders within the organisation are role models and challenge assumptions, encourage self-reflection, and set an example for their teams.

The Learning Impact Award is presented to an enterprise that has implemented any kind of learning intervention on its own, or to a provider who produced a learning programme that included an evaluation and measurement strategy with quantifiable positive outcomes.

41512722-233d-40a4-9845-0827a49442cd.description: The Learning Awards recognise outstanding examples of high standards, best practice, innovation and excellence in Learning and Development. The Learning Professional of the Year Award is presented to an individual (employed or freelance) who has shown exceptional skills in learning and development.
41512722-233d-40a4-9845-0827a49442cd.name: Learning Professional of the Year 2018 - Bronze Winner

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge holder has demonstrated evidence of innovation and client endorsement, being a well-rounded individual, having sound subject matter expertise, innovative delivery strategies and having a strong proposition in response to the challenge ‘what was special about your performance this year’? The Learning Professional of the Year can be working face-to-face or online or both. Quality of delivery and meeting client or employer needs is more important than mode of delivery.

f4ac5e3a-b321-46c4-83c1-a6d7ceb4c67f.description: This badge is awarded to organisations providing learning programmes, solutions and services to their external clients. In order to achieve the endorsement award, providers must work with an LPI consultant to measure the quality of its learning programme.
f4ac5e3a-b321-46c4-83c1-a6d7ceb4c67f.name: Learning Programme of Excellence

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: This badge demonstrates the quality in line with The LPI code of practice of the following:

Programme design process and delivery method
Programme monitoring, evaluation & review
Components of the learning programme content
Quality of learning environment & systems
Capacity for innovation
Measurement of impact
Brand image of the learning organisation
Understanding of market

7f0b2fb2-1945-4e26-aa27-c2ce009a7d8e.description: The badge holder has completed the Marketing for L&D masterclass, enabling them with the theory and practice of marketing techniques to drive awareness, interest, and engagement of learning in the workplace.
7f0b2fb2-1945-4e26-aa27-c2ce009a7d8e.name: Marketing for L&D masterclass 2023

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: Adopt a marketing mindset. Why does L&D need to think like a marketer?What is a marketing mindset and how to adopt it? What skills a marketing for learning practitioner needs. Customer-centricity and deepening understanding of audiences. Value proposition canvas.

Understand the value of learner personas and how to create them. What is a learner persona? What is the purpose of a persona? What does building a persona actually entail? How to build a persona. Triggering emotions and the WIIFM (what’s in it for me).

Understand marketing strategy fundamentals: What is a marketing strategy? Understanding the buyer’s journey in learning (AIDA and RACE models). Understanding competition when marketing your learning. The importance of benchmarking.
Increase core tactical skills in L&D practitioners in the following areas: Copywriting, Email marketing, Visual language, and design Storytelling.
Focuses on how to use marketing tools such as: Copywriting tools, Design tools such as Canva, Data capture tools, User-generated content tools.

How to build a marketing campaign. The coup de grace. This session shows learners how all of the previous sessions work together to build out an effective learning campaign. It explores: 6 critical steps in campaign planning, Campaign hooks, Planning and resourcing etc

issuer.summary: issued by LPI (Learning and Performance Institute)

badge_template_activities.title: Understand and appreciate the criteria within the competencies and the reasoning behind the training session structure by passing a written test.
Observe a full training session and record sufficient evidence to prove the trainer has either met or not met the criteria.

Plan and deliver feedback in a supportive, compassionate and effective manner ensuring full value comes from the assessing or monitoring event. Core competencies: monitoring, measuring and interactive learning among others.
